name: silver-powder
effect: Held in battle : Holder’s bug-type moves have 1.2× their power.
short_effect: Held: Bug-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises the power of BUG-type moves.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises the power of BUG-type moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A shiny silver powder that boosts the power of BUG-type moves.
